findings.title: A code is implemented differently than intended.
findings.description: The require statement in _ElyfiToken#initMigration() function always reverts because it checks if _ElyfiToken#_newElyfiToken_ variable is not Zero Address, but the default value of this variable is Zero Address.

findings.title: There is a missing Event.
findings.description: When an Event is missing, it is difficult to identify real-time whether an accurate value is recorded on the blockchain.
